WSUS31 KKCI 060855 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 43E 
VALID UNTIL 1055Z 
FL CSTL WTRS 
FROM 20E MIA-70E MIA-90SE MIA-60S MIA-20E MIA 
AREA TS MOV FROM 23010KT. TOPS TO FL430. 
REF INTL SIGMET MIKE SERIES. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 061055-061455 
AREA 1...FROM 160SE ECG-140SSE ILM-190ENE PBI-70E PBI-130SE 
MIA-80WSW EYW-110W PIE-150ESE LEV-VUZ-160SE ECG 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 70E BOS-140ENE ACK-180SE ACK-110SSE ACK-30W ACK-70E 
BOS 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS.
